transcript_chunks.text: how I built a flying machine and Zelda tears of the Kingdom I needed to get this green stone to that Sky Island over there so I went over to this heap of material I grabbed a glider and I placed it on this board with wheels from there I attached a couple of fans for acceleration I also added a couple of fuel tanks to make sure I had power and then I attached a control lever right on top to make sure I could pilot this thing to finish it off I glued the stone to my flying machine to make sure it wouldn't fall off grabbing the lever turns it on and now it's ready to take off and that's
